name: Cell Simulator
description:
=== CELL SIMULATOR v0.85 ===

This is a microscope sandbox world. Here you will be able to create and interact with aerobic and anaerobic cells.

The goal is to create a self-sustaining environment where 2 or more cells will balance the gases and protein production.

---------- INSTRUCTIONS ----------

***For a better experience, play with (Fullscreen Mode).***

***For a better experience, play with (Chrome).***

***Updates are coming, leave your Suggestion =D***

***Virus are being implemented to increase the possibilities of Gameplay***

----- SCROLL THE MOUSE WHEEL OVER -----

1 - Gases TAG --> To change the gases (%).

2 - Population TAG --> To change the (Max Population).

3 - Protein TAG --> To change the (Max Protein Production).

4 - Spore TAG --> To change the (Max Spore Release).

5 - Function TAG  --> To change the (Mouse Function).

6 - FPS TAG  --> To change the (Frame Rate).

7 - Auto Generation --> To turn ON/OFF the (Auto Cell Generation).

7 - Create Mode TAGs --> To change each (Variable).

----- PRESS THE BUTTON -----

1 -( SPACE) --> To create (Random cells).

2 - (1) --> To select the (Info Function).

3 - (2) --> To select the (Clone/Kill Function).

4 - (3) --> To select the (Copy/Paste Function).

5 - (4) --> To select the (Create Aerobic Spore/Anaerobic Spore Function).

6 - (C or ENTER) --> To Start a (Create Mode).

7 - (ESC) --> To close all the (Info Windows).

8 - (P) --> To (Pause/Play) the Simulator.

9 - (') --> To (Debug).

10 - (F11) --> To Enter/Exit (Fullscreen Mode).

----- HOLD (SHIFT) AND -----

1 - Press the (SPACE) button --> To (Kill all the Cells).

2 - Click over a cell and drag --> To (Move the Cell).

=== CELL SIMULATOR v0.85 ===
